metadata.title: Kolongvangie Cargo Shorts Elastic Waist Drawstring Cotton Casual Outdoor Lightweight Multi-Pocket Short
features: MATERIAL AND FABRIC: 100% Natural Cotton. Soft and breathalbe fabric.High quality workmanship
STYLE AND DESIGN: Details include flexible stretch waist and gusset for comfort and easy movement.Simple But Fashionable.

Solid Color Cargo Shorts with MULTI-POCKETS: 8 pockets are practical and functional for storage common objects for everyday wear or work. 2 slide slant pockets, 2 back pockets, 4 (2 shallow DEC included) thign pockets.

FUNCTION AND SIZING: Perfect for casual wear, everyday use, lounging, or anything in between. An essential short that combines style and function. Available in your favorite colors/sizes. (Army Green Beige Black Khaki Grass Green and Camo Series ) (28 to 46) See size chart.

Additional Features: Black Braid extended from Pocket Flap,make these shorts highly stylish and different from usual cargo shorts. Size US 42 is bigger than usual,equals to US 42-US 44.Size US 44 is bigger than usual too,equals to US 44-US46.
description: Kolongvangie LEISURES: Our apparel draws inspiration from the East Coast surf and skate scenes. Clothing designed for individuals whose lifestyles are active, functional and adventurous. Designs feature modern and innovative details that appeal to everyone.
